## Dashboard interface

Dashboard service container

Signature:

```typescript
export interface Dashboard extends Service
```

Extends: [Service](/api/bud-framework/service)

| ------------------------------------------------- | ------------------- | ----------------- |
| [instance](/api/bud-framework/dashboard/instance) | Ink.Instance        | CLI framework     |
